message: Let's be fair, 60-40 is a good start
I understand you want a larger share, but I need a bit more than that. How about a 55/45 split?
Meet me in the middle, 58-42 is a good compromise
Time is running out, and we're both losing money.  I'm willing to come down a little further. 52/48 is my final offer.
Still not good enough, I'll come down a bit, 57-43 is my new offer
